title: Alt (2013)
overview: The perfect life of a woman spirals out of control after everything around her starts to mysteriously vanish.
storyline: Sofía is living the life she always wanted: a beautiful child, a successful husband and a nice house. One day she wakes up to a series of events she can't explain. One by one, everything that represents an emotional connection to her starts to dematerialize.
plot: Sofía is living the life she always wanted: a beautiful child, a successful husband and a nice house. One day, she wakes up with a series of visions she can't explain. Eventually, her family and every object that represents an emotional connection to her starts to dematerialize one by one.
